FuncDef: This command creates a Traffic Engineering (TE) Link in LMP across a GMPLS UNI. An unsigned integer TE link ID must be specified when the TE Link is first created. Once the link is created, the user can configure the link name (that is 'link-name te-link-name'). From here, the user can refer to this TE Link by either the unsigned integer or the ASCII name.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the TE Link. Values-1 to 4294967295 | te-link-name
te-link-name: 32 character (max) name of the TE Link.
